sentences.en: Agence professor Adjunct professors may have doctors a doctorate.
sentences.cn: 临时雇用教授可能也有博士学位.

sentences.en: An honorary doctorate of law was conferred on him by Newcastle University in 1976.
sentences.cn: 1976年，纽卡斯尔大学授予他荣誉法学博士学位。

sentences.en: Anyone who earns a doctorate is expected to do original research.
sentences.cn: 攻读博士的人都得做有创新的研究.

sentences.en: Center staff more than 20 people, including master's, doctorate of 90 percent.
sentences.cn: 中心现有员工20余人, 其中硕士 、 博士占90%以上.

sentences.en: He hasn't enough credits to get his doctorate.
sentences.cn: 他的学分不够取得博士学位.

sentences.en: He received a doctorate of philosophy in political science at Columbia University.
sentences.cn: 他获哥伦比亚大学政治学博士学位.

sentences.en: He received an honorary doctorate degree in Humane Letters.
sentences.cn: 他刚获得了人文主义文学名誉博士学位.

sentences.en: He worked hard at English literature and obtained a doctorate.
sentences.cn: 他努力攻读英国文学,并获得了博士学位.

sentences.en: I have a doctorate in economics; my dissertation focused on financial decision - making.
sentences.cn: 我有经济学博士头衔, 我学位论文是以财政决策为主.

sentences.en: I suppose he would be about fifty when he obtained a doctorate.
sentences.cn: 我推测他获得博士学位时大概是五十岁左右.

sentences.en: James Bond: Do you have a doctorate in that as well?
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·德: 你有这方面的博士头衔 吗 ?

sentences.en: Never mind. I'm kidding. But I have a doctorate degree.
sentences.cn: 这只是一句玩笑,别介意. 我是一位博士生.

sentences.en: Professor Lanphier obtained his doctorate in social psychology from the University of Michigan.
sentences.cn: 兰菲尔教授从密歇根大学获得了社会心理学博士学位。

sentences.en: She had been wondering what research she should undertake in order to gain her Doctorate.
sentences.cn: 她一直思来想去,为了取得博士学位,应该从事什么研究.

sentences.en: Where did she do her doctorate?

words.tran_cn: 博士的；博士学位的；有博士学位的
修理；窜改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

trans.tran_en: a university degree of the highest level
